## FrontFace enumeration

Define front- and back-facing polygons

```csharp
public enum FrontFace
```

### Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Clockwise | `0` | Clockwise order is front face |
| CounterClockwise | `1` | Counter-clockwise order is front face |
